name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Pandora Tomorrow HD
storyline: In March 2006, the United States has established a military presence in the newly-independent country of East Timor to train the East Timorese military in their fight against anti-separatist Indonesian guerrilla militias. Foremost among these militias is the Darah Dan Doa (English: Blood and Prayer), led by the charismatic Suhadi Sadono.
summary: An HD version of Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Pandora Tomorrow is included in the Splinter Cell Trilogy. The PlayStation 3 version is ported from the PC version. It upscales to 1080p, supports stereoscopic 3D and features a new HUD. It also incorporates quicksaves. This version sometimes suffers from crashing when quick-loading as well as performance stuttering.
